channel.title: Spdl on Speedle
channel.description: Recent content in Spdl on Speedle

item.title: SPDL - Security Policy Definition Language
item.description: Syntax Keywords The reserved keywords in SPDL are as follows. You cannot use any of these keywords as user name, group name, action, resource, attribute name, and so on. role user group entity grant deny if in on from The keywords are all case-insensitive, which means that you cannot use one of “role”, “ROLE”, “Role”, “rOLe”, etc as user name, group name, action, resource, attribute name, and so on.
